SELECT prs_code, prs_name, prs_detail
FROM process

SELECT prr.prs_date, pr.prs_name, pre.err_code, pre.prs_err_qty, ee.emp_name, er.err_name
FROM process pr JOIN process_run prr ON pr.prs_code = prr.prs_code JOIN process_inf pri ON prr.prs_no = pri.prs_no JOIN process_err pre ON pre.prs_pf_no = pri.prs_pf_no JOIN error er ON er.err_code = pre.err_code JOIN employee ee ON ee.emp_id = prr.prs_manager
WHERE pr.prs_name = #{prsCode} ORDER BY prr.prs_date DESC

SELECT prr.prs_date, pr.prs_name, pre.prs_err_qty, pre.err_code, er.err_name, ee.emp_name
FROM process_run prr JOIN process_inf pri ON prr.prs_no = pri.prs_no JOIN process pr ON pr.prs_code = prr.prs_code JOIN process_err pre ON pre.prs_pf_no = pri.prs_pf_no JOIN error er ON pre.err_code = er.err_code JOIN employee ee ON ee.emp_id = prr.prs_manager
ORDER BY prr.prs_date DESC
